title: [b]Textbox Size[/b]
desc:
Governs the height of the textbox. Automatic will use a size proportional to the number of lines in card text.
[b](Default: Automatic)[/b]

title: [b]Render Textless[/b]
desc:
When enabled, card will be rendered with only a name and type box and no textbox or other text elements.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Legendary Crown Textured[/b]
desc:
When disabled, removes textures from Legendary Crown to give it a more minimalist look.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Panorama Mode[/b]
desc:
Renders N cards, where N is the amount of times the artwork can be split horizontally to fit into the frame. The resulting cards, when cropped, make a seamless panorama.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Use Nickname[/b]
desc:
When enabled, card will be rendered with both a 'real' name and a 'nickname' you can enter manually or specify in the image name as [nick=...].
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Text Drop Shadow[/b]
desc:
When enabled, card text will have a drop shadow.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Max Frame Colors[/b]
desc:
How many colors can the frame split by before the card just becomes Gold?
[b](Default: 2)[/b]

title: [b]Colored Hybrid Cards[/b]
desc:
When enabled, hybrid cards will have blended name plate colors and a colored PT Box.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Authentic Front Face Colors[/b]
desc:
When enabled, front face MDFC and Transform cards will have authentic lighter colors.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Darker Land Colors[/b]
desc:
When enabled, non-colored Land elements will use a darker brownish color.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Artifact Colored Elements[/b]
desc:
Governs whether Twins (name and type boxes), PT Box, and Textbox have color on colored artifacts.
[b](Default: Only PT)[/b]

title: [b]Multicolor PT[/b]
desc:
When enabled, the PT Box on multicolor cards will use the last color instead of gold, e.g. URB -> Black.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Multicolor Twins[/b]
desc:
When enabled, the Name and Type boxes on multicolor cards will use blended colors instead of Gold.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Multicolor Textbox[/b]
desc:
When enabled, the Textbox on multicolor cards will use blended colors instead of Gold.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Multicolor Pinlines[/b]
desc:
When enabled, the Pinlines and Legendary Crown on multicolor cards will use blended colors instead of Gold.
[b](Default: True)[/b]
